title: Real-Time Retail Analytics Engine
description: Streaming POS events via Kafka → dbt → live Streamlit dashboard. 50 k events/min at sub-second latency.
body: An end-to-end streaming pipeline ingesting point-of-sale events via Kafka, transforming them in dbt, and surfacing a live Streamlit dashboard. Handles 50 k events/min at sub-second latency.

title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: AUC 0.91 on 2M-row telecom data. FastAPI serving with SHAP explainability endpoint for product decisions.
body: A production-grade churn classifier achieving AUC 0.91 on a 2M-row telecom dataset. Model served via FastAPI, with SHAP explainability endpoint for the product team.

title: Academic Paper Summariser
description: Fine-tuned BART on arxiv corpus. Structured, jargon-aware paper summaries — 300+ monthly users.
body: Fine-tuned a BART model on a curated arxiv corpus to produce structured, jargon-aware summaries of academic CS papers. Deployed as a public Streamlit app with 300+ monthly active users.

title: Inventory Optimisation Dashboard
description: Stock-out risk scores and reorder triggers reducing retail overstock by 18%.
body: Built for a retail client to surface stock-out risk scores and reorder triggers. Combines historical sell-through rates with supplier lead-time variability to reduce overstock by 18%.

title: Bias Detection in Hiring Datasets
description: Auditing public hiring data for disparate impact and calibration bias across gender and ethnicity.
body: An SFU research project auditing three public hiring datasets for disparate impact and calibration bias across gender and ethnicity dimensions. Includes a reweighing pre-processor pipeline.

title: Demand Forecasting with Prophet
description: 200+ SKU forecasts with holiday regressors and zero-touch weekly retraining via Airflow.
body: Weekly demand forecasts for 200+ product SKUs using Facebook Prophet with holiday regressors and multiplicative seasonality. Orchestrated with Airflow for zero-touch weekly retraining.

title: dbt Semantic Layer Implementation
description: 300-model migration cutting BI query duplication 60% and analyst on-boarding from 3 weeks to 4 days.
body: Migrated a 300-model legacy warehouse to dbt Core with a semantic layer, reducing BI query duplication by 60% and cutting analyst on-boarding time from 3 weeks to 4 days.

title: Shelf Occupancy Monitor
description: YOLOv8 on Raspberry Pi detecting empty shelf slots and pushing real-time stock-out Slack alerts.
body: A lightweight YOLOv8 model deployed on a Raspberry Pi 5 to detect empty shelf slots in real time and push stock-out alerts to a Slack channel — built during a hackathon in 36 hours.

title: Experimentation Framework
description: Internal A/B platform with frequentist & Bayesian methods, auto sample sizing, and live significance tracking.
body: An internal A/B testing platform supporting frequentist and Bayesian approaches, automatic sample-size calculation, and a real-time significance dashboard — replacing spreadsheet-based experiment tracking.

title: Interview Prep Chatbot
description: RAG chatbot ingesting résumé + JD, simulating a behavioural interview with STAR-method feedback.
body: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation chatbot that ingests a user's résumé and a job description, then conducts a simulated behavioural interview — providing structured STAR-method feedback after each response.
